ComicInfo.Summary: Just Desserts, 4 of 5: We get a flashback to Tony's previous girlfriend, which explains his inability to make a strong commitment to Amelia. The FDA has Mason Savoy cornered, but Mason manages to escape. Caesar continues to feed information to Mason, who decides he must step up the pressure against Tony.
